videos.title: M.I.A. 'Bad Girls' (2012)
videos.description: M.I.A.'s "Bad Girls" music video is a visually stunning showcase of Saudi-inspired car stunts, with drifting vehicles on two wheels and empowered women in a desert setting, blending Middle Eastern cultural elements with modern rebellion. Directed by Romain Gavras, the video highlights themes of female empowerment and defiance, all set against a backdrop of high-octane action and surreal imagery.
videos.additional_info:
M.I.A. 'Bad Girls' (2012)

Directed by Romain Gavras, the video highlights themes of female empowerment and defiance, all set against a backdrop of high-octane action and surreal imagery.
Technique - Haze
Director - Romain Gavras
DOP - André Chemetoff
Editor - Walter Mauriot

videos.title: Vince Staples - Norf Norf (2015)
videos.description: The music video for "Norf Norf" by Vince Staples, released in 2015, features documentary-style footage that portrays the harsh realities of life in North Long Beach, California. Through scenes of Vince in a police car and visuals of his neighborhood, the video underscores the song's themes of systemic injustice and police brutality.
videos.additional_info:
Vince Staples - Norf Norf (2015)

Through scenes of Vince in a police car and visuals of his neighborhood, the video underscores the song's themes of systemic injustice and police brutality.
Technique - Haze
Director - Spike Jordan, Vince Staples

videos.title: Sabrina Carpenter - Espresso (2024)
videos.description: The music video for Sabrina Carpenter's song "Espresso," released in 2024, was directed by Dave Meyers. The video features vibrant and sun-soaked visuals, showcasing Carpenter in various stylish outfits as she navigates a dreamy, retro-inspired setting. With a playful and energetic vibe, the video highlights Carpenter's charisma and the song's catchy, upbeat nature. The creative direction was managed by Jacobi Mehringer and Anna Arnell, adding to the video's polished and dynamic aesthetic.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
videos.additional_info:
Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
Technique - Choreo , Haze
